backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that manages galleries and images with CRUD operations, using blob storage mixin and Map data structures for persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the update of Footer component social media links to actual URLs for Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and WhatsApp channel.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components describing their functionality, including Hero, About, Courses, Gallery, AdmissionForm, Contact, Footer, and supporting components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, and title "Brilliant Coaching Centre Website".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps all sections in LanguageProvider and renders Hero, About, Courses, WhyChooseUs, Teachers, TeachersNotes, Gallery, AdmissionForm, Contact, Footer, LanguageToggle, FloatingWhatsApp, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Us section displaying four feature cards (Concept Clarity, Personal Care, Discipline, Exam Preparation) with icons, bilingual content, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionForm.ts: Admission enquiry form component that collects student details (name, class, subject, mobile) and sends formatted WhatsApp message to +91 98834 48350 with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying address, phone, and WhatsApp info in three cards with clickable actions, plus a map placeholder, all with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Displays a grid of three course offerings (LKG-Class IV, Class V-X, Class XI-XII) with icons, subjects, and descriptions in bilingual format. Uses Card components with hover effects and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp button in the bottom-right corner that opens a chat with a pre-filled message for inquiries. Uses green WhatsApp branding colors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays footer with logo watermark, contact information, social media links (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp), and attribution to developer. Includes bilingual content and current year display.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Shows a responsive photo gallery grid with lightbox dialog for full-size viewing. Includes navigation controls (previous/next) and displays classroom and event images with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with animated background, centered logo, institute name, tagline (Education • Discipline • Success), and WhatsApp CTA button. Includes scroll indicator animation.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Fixed top-right button that toggles between English and Bengali languages using the LanguageContext. Displays opposite language name as button text.
frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx: Displays three teacher profiles in a grid with avatar initials, classes taught, subjects, experience, and focus areas. Features hover effects and bilingual content for each teacher card.
frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.ts: React component displaying teacher profiles and downloadable class notes organized by grade levels (LKG-3, 4-10, 4-12) with tabbed navigation and bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: React component showcasing five key benefits of the coaching center (experienced teachers, small batches, regular tests, friendly environment, affordable fees) in a grid layout with icons.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider for bilingual (English/Bengali) language switching with session storage persistence and translation helper function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, using React Query for caching and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark theme using gold/maroon color scheme, OKLCH color space, custom animations, and utility classes for brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH colors (gold/maroon), container settings, animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a bilingual coaching centre website with 25 versions, featuring hero section, courses, teacher profiles, photo gallery, WhatsApp integration, and downloadable class notes. Includes architectural notes for mobile-first design, brand colors (gold/yellow, dark background, maroon accents), and generated teacher portrait images.
